name: Immutable
description: Choose one Secondary Resistance, you gain complete immunity in that resistance type

name: Lucky
description: 3 rerolls per day, keep the higher roll

name: Perfectionist
description: You can reroll once, any roll that is equal to or below your Tier.

name: Robot
description: Immune to most Vitality and Resolve conditions, vulnerable to Hacking/Electricity, requires repairs to heal during a rest rather than natural healing, you count as object for healing purposes.
